mn4:20.9: tassa mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa etadahosi → tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ hoti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); tassa mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa evaṃ hoti (sya-all)
mn4:20.13: tathābhūtaṃ tathābhūtova → tathābhūtatathābhūto va (bj); tathābhūto tathābhūtova (sya-all) | yathābhūtaṃ yathābhūtassa → yathābhūtayathābhūtassa (bj); yathābhūtassa yathābhūtassa (sya-all)
